text:
Giuseppe Ottaviani (20 May 1916 – 19 July 2020) was an Italian centenarian and masters athlete. He was born in Sant'Ippolito, Italy.
He turned 100 in May 2016. Ottaviani died in Sant'Ippolito on 19 July 2020 at the age of 104.
He was the first and only centenary athlete to make triple jump. He was the indoor world record holder in the M95 and M100 60 metres. He also held the indoor world record for the triple jump and long jump, and the outdoor world record for the triple jump.
